posts.post_title: CDV  with Harry Wright and Abner Doubleday 1870's
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
This is a college of 500 historical figures with Harry Wright and Abner Doubleday among the many historical people(500). There could be other baseball players among the many foke. The bottom of the CDV say's "with a magnify glass you can see all historical celeb's ". I had one similar to this that I sold on ebay for $360 but was not as nice as this one or as clear. Price is $300 delivered. Serious inquires only.
